Visibility: 32.2 km

Dewpoint: -8.7°C

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
